TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DayRenderEventArgs extends System.Object

summary.span: 为 控件的 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管控件不支持数据绑定，但也可以 修改各个日期单元的内容和格式设置。Although data binding is not supported for the control, it is possible to modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells. 在 控件显示在网页上之前，它将创建并汇编构成控件的组件。Before the control is displayed on the Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control. 当创建控件中的每个日期单元格时，将引发事件 。The event is raised when each date cell in the control is created. 可以通过在事件的事件处理程序中提供代码来控制日期单元格的内容和格式设置 。You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell when it is created by providing code in the event handler for the event. 事件处理程序接收 包含事件数据的对象。The event handler receives a object that contains event data. 使用 属性访问正在呈现的单元格。Use the property to access the cell being rendered. 若要访问呈现的日期的属性，请使用 属性。To access the properties of the day being rendered, use the property. 自定义单元格的内容时，您可能希望在用户选择呈现的日期时保留回发行为。When customizing the content for a cell, you might want to preserve the postback behavior when the user selects the date being rendered. 这通常通过呈现用于将页面作为自定义内容的一部分进行发布的脚本来完成。This is typically done by rendering the script used to post the page as part of the custom content. 若要检索用于将页面回发到服务器的脚本，请使用 属性。To retrieve the script used to post the page back to the server, use the property. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表 ，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件指定和编写处理程序的代码， 以使背景色在显示的月份中的日期为黄色。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to make the background color yellow for the days in the displayed month. 它还演示了如何通过将 控件添加到单元格来自定义单元格的内容。It also demonstrates how to customize the contents of a cell by adding a control to the cell. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Calendar.DayRender Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Calendar.DayRender Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Calendar.DayRender Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Calendar.DayRender Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 当 通过调用此构造函数创建的实例时，会将下表中显示的属性初始化为指定值。When an instance of is created by a call to this constructor, the properties shown in the following table are initialized to the specified values. |propertiesProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`cell` 参数的值。The value of the `cell` parameter.| ||`day` 参数的值。The value of the `day` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员使用。This constructor is used primarily by control developers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 当 通过调用此构造函数创建的实例时，会将下表中显示的属性初始化为指定值。When an instance of is created by a call to this constructor, the properties shown in the following table are initialized to the specified values. |propertiesProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`cell` 参数的值。The value of the `cell` parameter.| ||`day` 参数的值。The value of the `day` parameter.| ||`selectUrl` 参数的值。The value of the `selectUrl` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员使用。This constructor is used primarily by control developers.

summary.span: 获取表示呈现在 控件中的单元格的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object that represents the cell being rendered in the control.

value.span: 表示呈现在 中的单元格的 。

span.span: The that represents the cell being rendered in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性以编程方式控制在控件中呈现的单元格 。Use the property to programmatically control the cell being rendered in the control. 您可以通过将控件动态添加到属性的集合来自定义单元格的内容 。You can customize the contents of a cell by dynamically adding controls to the collection of the property. > [!NOTE] > 由于在 呈现控件时引发事件 ，因此无法添加也可能引发事件的控件，例如 。Because the event is raised while the control is being rendered, you cannot add a control that can also raise an event, such as . 只能添加静态控件，例如 、、 和 。You can add only static controls, such as , , , and . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以 编程方式将显示的月份中的日期的背景色更改为黄色。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically change the background color of the days in the displayed month to yellow. 它还演示了如何通过将 控件添加到属性集合来自定义单元格的内容 。It also demonstrates how to customize the contents of a cell by adding a control to the collection of the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DayRenderEventArgs.Cell Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DayRenderEventArgs.Cell Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DayRenderEventArgs.Cell Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DayRenderEventArgs.Cell Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取表示呈现在 控件中的日期的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object that represents the day being rendered in the control.

value.span: 表示呈现在 中的日期的 。

span.span: The that represents the day being rendered in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可获取有关在控件中呈现的日期的信息 。Use the property to get information about the day being rendered in the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来确定控件中呈现的日期 是当前月份还是工作日。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether the day being rendered in the control is in the current month and also a weekday. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DayRenderEventArgs.Day Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DayRenderEventArgs.Day Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DayRenderEventArgs.Day Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DayRenderEventArgs.Day Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取在 控件中选择呈现的日期时用于将此页回发至服务器的脚本。

span.span: Gets the script used to post the page back to the server when the date being rendered is selected in a control.

value.span: 选择呈现的日期时用于将此页回发至服务器的脚本。

span.span: The script used to post the page back to the server when the date being rendered is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可检索在控件中选择呈现的日期时用于将页面回发到服务器的脚本 。Use the property to retrieve the script used to post the page back to the server when the date being rendered is selected in a control. 如果要自定义为日期呈现的内容，但仍希望保留回发行为，通常使用此属性。This property is typically used when you want to customize the content rendered for a date, but still want to retain the postback behavior. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何自定义为今天的日期呈现的内容。The following code example demonstrates how to customize the content rendered for today's date. 属性的值将 插入到呈现的内容中，以便在 用户选择当天的日期时，控件将回发到服务器。The value of the property is inserted into the rendered content so that the control will post back to the server when the user selects today's date. [!code-aspx-csharp[DayRenderEventArgsSelectUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/dayrendereventargsselecturl/CS/DayRenderEventArgsSelectUrlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DayRenderEventArgsSelectUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/dayrendereventargsselecturl/VB/DayRenderEventArgsSelectUrlvb.aspx#1)]
